title: How does the US Democratic Party help small businesses? - Quora

response.answer_text: In Massachusetts, it hinders small businesses rather than help. There are articles showing how Mass “helps” small businesses, but in fact MA is very choosy about the kind of business it is. They’ve allowed the sale of canabis, brought gambling in but manufacturers aren’t too welcome. It takes a long time to get approval for restaurants, too.
The Democratic party taxes small business into wealth. They successfully for decades have told business they need to pay more taxes, and they will create more wealth. People actually buy it too lol
